description:
Proton completely changed the game for Linux gaming, WINE has existed for a long time but by putting the force of Valve behind it, making it easier to use you can now play most Steam games with 0 thought and that same change may be coming to ARM64 hardware

title: Valve Leaks Upcoming Proton Support For ARM Devices
